other_tests.findings: Evidence of lung adenocarcinoma with a mutation in KRAS.
Sinus tachycardia, a rightward axis, and minor nonspecific ST-segment and T-wave changes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: On hospital days 2 through 6, ST-segment depressions were more pronounced in the inferolateral leads.

other_tests.findings: Left ventricular ejection fraction of 57%; subtle hypokinesis in the mid-inferior, basal inferior, and basal inferoseptal walls, mild-to-moderate tricuspid regurgitation, no evidence of pericardial effusion.
Inflammatory infiltrate composed primarily of macrophages and lymphocytes associated with myocardial injury; characteristics of lymphocytic myocarditis.
